node.statement: STEP 5 - PARITY ANALYSIS (Lemma 14): By Lemma 14 (VALIDATED), sign(g_1) = (-1)^{n+3}, sign(g_2) = (-1)^{k+3}, sign(g_3) = (-1)^{m+3}. Arithmetic: (-1)^{x+3} = (-1)^x * (-1)^3 = -(-1)^x, so (-1)^{x+3} = +1 iff (-1)^x = -1 iff x is odd. Therefore: generator g_i is even iff its tail length is odd.
